content.prompt: Which of the following correctly identifies the type of habitat change(s) shown within each potential scenario in the diagram?

choices.label: Scenario 1 experienced habitat fragmentation, while Scenarios 2 and 3 experienced habitat loss only.
Scenarios 1 and 2 experienced habitat loss, while Scenarios 3 experienced habitat fragmentation only.
All scenarios experienced habitat loss, but only Scenario 3 experienced habitat fragmentation.
All scenarios experienced habitat fragmentation, but only Scenario 2 experienced habitat loss.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe characteristics of an environmental concept, process, or model represented visually.
